title: Maritime workers lament delay in port concession licences renewal - Nigeria Economy news - NewsLocker
text: By Steve AgbotaMaritime Workers under the aegis of Maritime Workers Union of Nigeria (MWUN) on Thursday expressed their displeasure over the continuous delay in the renewal of the port concession licenses of the terminal operators at the nation’s seaports. President of MWUN, Adewale Adeyanju, who made this known at the 2024 Dockworkers Day organised by the Shipping Correspondents Association of Nigeria (SCAN) in collaboration with the union in Lagos,
